subject: RESOLVED: Elana login bug - users can see events
body:
Team,

Elana bug FIXED and CONFIRMED working.

## Summary
- **Root cause**: useEvents.js blocked on missing userDefaults, ignoring valid mapCenter from GeoLocationContext
- **Fix**: Check currentLocation before blocking (commit bd5df9a)
- **Deployed**: DEVL → TEST → PROD (all branches synced)
- **Verified**: El Gotan confirmed Elana can now see events when logged in

## Commits
- DEVL: bd5df9a
- TEST: 92d87ee
- PROD: ffa82d8

## Next Steps
- Phase 3 migration (consolidate to mapCenter, remove old userDefaults refs) can proceed when prioritized
- Atlas approved Option A

— Sarah
